sentence.Network_en: Based on the concept of configuration, the system can be viewed hierarchically.

sentence.Network_en: Secondly, the realization methods of the hierarchically distributed architecture are introduced.

sentence.Network_en: Aeorautic product project , which is generally big and complex, is organized hierarchically.
